user_query: I want to surprise my family with a movie night and I need recommendations for family-friendly films. Can you search for family movies released in the past year and provide their ratings? Additionally, fetch the movie info for the highest rated family movie from the search results.

TaskList.description: Search for family-friendly films released in the past year and retrieve their ratings.
Identify the highest rated family movie from the search results.
Fetch detailed movie information for the highest rated family movie.
